WorkItem.ClosedComment: http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Floating_point#Accuracy_problems - Your solution, as it is with every single computer language in existence is to format your value to an appropriate number of decimal places.
WorkItem.Description:
the issue is about to calculateCellValue

Cell A1 sets 7%
Cell B1 sets A1*10000

In excel file, i see "B1" show 700.
when I use class PHPExcel_Worksheet method toArray
I got B1 is 700.0000000000001

but other number is normal.
ex: 0.7%  17%  77%

just only 7% is covert to 700.0000000000001

I use Excel 2003
PHPExcel version 1.7.8 and 1.7.6
